content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code happier50 for 50% off the original price or use the code happier100 for a free copy if you download for free i d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️ thank you for your support introducing the happier than ever coaster pattern a simple yet elegant design that adds a touch of warmth and style to any space inspired by billie eilish s emotional ballad this coaster features soft puffs and delicate shell edges creating a charming balance of texture and grace perfect for beginners the pattern is easy to follow offering just the right mix of simplicity and sophistication for anyone looking to add a personal handmade touch to their home decor whether you re new to crochet or a seasoned crafter this coaster will bring joy and coziness to your table leaving you feeling happier than ever this pattern is made in dk weight yarn with a 4 5mm hook i think a synthetic or plant fiber is best for a coaster as you will want it to be easy care this coaster is worked in the round featuring double_crochet stitch work increases every round encorporating a decorative puff round ending with a dainty scalloped edging gauge is not crucial in such a small piece this pattern is written for one size which should be a perfect fit for most mugs if you find that it is too small/too large for your mug i encourage you to experiment with another gauge or the number of rounds this is a beginner friendly pattern it uses basic stitches and includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions there are also links to video tutorials for all the special techniques thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support thank you to my
